description: I interviewed Jin and he was a pretty cool guy and doesn't afraid of anything

segments.question: Tell me about yourself
segments.response:
I'm a pretty cool dude. I'm going to repeat this a few times so I can see what a long question looks like. Oops here's a line break.
Better use triple braces to include this or it won't work. Okay I think this looks like enough text maybe just a little more for good measure.

Fuck it why not include some more line breaks. Oh wait, maybe I should do paragraphs.

Here's a paragraph.

And here's another. Okay I'm done.

segments.quote: I love to make digital art it gets me jollies going.
